results.title: Metformin and adipose-derived stem cell combination therapy alleviates radiation-induced skin fibrosis in mice
results.text_hl: ...Our study suggests @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential as a prophylactic measure to prevent @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Fibrosis_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000087525 @@@RISF@@@, and the combination of ASCs and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ holds promise for late-stage @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Fibrosis_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000087525 @@@RISF@@@ treatment.
